title: #HpeDirectoryGroup.v1_0_0.HpeDirectoryGroup
description: This is the schema definition for directory group management.

GroupDn.description: The complete or shortened distinguished name of the directory group.

GroupSid.description: The security identifier of the directory group (for kerberos authentication and Active Directory integration only).
